name: Elevated Dread
description:
You are just a regular child who can't wait to get his first salary from putting up flyers on people's apartment doors. This is the last house you need to do this in, so go ahead!

Average playtime: 20 minutes

Key features:
  • Unsettling and unnerving atmosphere
  • Atmospheric sound design
  • Cool graphics
  • An elevator
